#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string str;
	int t;
	map<string,int> mymap;
	int m=0;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>str;
		if(!mymap.count(str))
		mymap[str]=1;
		else
		mymap[str]+=1;
		int x=mymap[str];
		if(x>m)
		{
			m=x;
			cout<<m<<" "<<str<<endl;
		}
	}
}
